entries.name: is_alias_for
entries.desc: Sets the module or class this is constant is an alias for.

entries.name: new(name, value, comment)
entries.desc: Creates a new constant with name, value and comment

entries.name: ==(other)
entries.desc: Constants are equal when their parent and name is the same

entries.name: documented?()
entries.desc: A constant is documented if it has a comment, or is an alias for a documented class or module.

entries.name: is_alias_for()
entries.desc: The module or class this constant is an alias for

entries.name: marshal_dump()
entries.desc: Dumps this Constant for use by ri.  See also marshal_load

entries.name: marshal_load(array)
entries.desc: Loads this Constant from array.  For a loaded Constant the following methods will return cached values:

entries.name: path()
entries.desc: Path to this constant for use with HTML generator output.

entries.name: store=(store)
entries.desc: Sets the store for this class or module and its contained code objects.
